SustainabilityCredit.name: SustainabilityCredit
SustainabilityCredit.description: Represents information about the sustainability credits that are a part of a sustainability purchase.

CostPerUnit.description: The cost of the credits for each unit of emissions.

CrbnCreditProjectId.description: The carbon credit project that's associated with sustainability credit.

CreditsAllocated.description: The credits that are allocated to the emissions inventory of the organization.

CreditsAvailable.description: The credits that are available after allocation.

CreditsIssueDate.description: The date when the credits were issued.

CreditsPurchased.description: The credits that are purchased by the organization.

CreditsRetiredDate.description: The date when the credits are retired from the registry.

CreditsUnit.description: The unit of measure for the credits.

Description.description: The description of the sustainability credit item.

ExternalIdentifier.description: The external identifier of the data that is imported for the carbon credit project.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the sustainability credit item.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

PurchaseDate.description: The date when the sustainability credits were purchased.

Status.description: Specifies the status of the sustainability credit.

SupplierId.description: The name of the organization responsible for supplying the sustainability credits.

SustainabilityPurchaseId.description: The sustainability purchase record that's associated with the purchase of sustainability credits, such as carbon credits.

TotalCost.description: The total amount spent on the credits.

VintageYear.description: The year when the sustainability credits were issued.
